channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: US federal employees file complaint against ban on gender-affirming care
item.description: Complaint argues Trump administration denying coverage of gender-affirming care is sex-based discrimination The Trump administration is facing a new l...

item.title: Two charities that received £1.1m from Sackler Trust kept anonymous to prevent ‘serious prejudice’
item.description: British charitable trust that draws on OxyContin maker fortune says it exempted names to protect their reputations Two charities that received a combi...

item.title: UK law firms get ready for crackdown on money laundering
item.description: Harsher penalties and a ‘reshaping’ of the sector predicted when Financial Conduct Authority takes over as regulator UK law firms are bracing themselv...

item.title: Switzerland resort fire latest news: ‘several dozen’ dead in Crans-Montana, as video appears to show bar ceiling alight
item.description: A further 100 people were injured in the bar early on Thursday morning, but police have ruled out an attack Officials at the press conference are aski...

item.title: Call for routine high blood pressure testing of UK children as cases almost double
item.description: Exclusive: Identifying teenagers at risk could help prevent organ damage, strokes and heart attacks in early adulthood, doctors say Leading doctors ha...

item.title: What we know so far about how the fire broke out
item.description: Several dozen people are presumed to have died in the fire at a New Year party in the resort of Crans-Montana.

item.title: Annual Channel migrant crossings highest since 2022
item.description: The 2025 total is the highest since 2022, when nearly 46,000 migrants made the crossing.

item.title: What went wrong between Chelsea and Maresca?
item.description: Less than six months after guiding Chelsea to Club World Cup success, Enzo Maresca has left. But how did things unravel?

item.title: Social media fuelled Mamdani's rise. Can he keep the momentum as New York mayor?
item.description: To succeed in office he will need to keep his supporters engaged with day-to-day governing, experts say.

item.title: Anderson beats Hood to join Searle in semi-finals
item.description: Ryan Searle and two-time champion Gary Anderson win their respective quarter-finals at the PDC World Championship.
